About Me

BIO

I love solving problems. I love the feeling you get when you figure something out!

Growing up, the only toys I was getting from my parents were rubiscubes and puzzles. That seeded in me this need to find a solution to any problem.

I got my undergraduate degree in Accounting. I even cleared all the 6 modules of the Canadian CPA ( chartered professional accountant). But I didn't show up for the Common final exam. I guess that makes me a CPA dropout. I never really enjoyed accounting. I only did it to fulfil my dad’s dream...But after 5 miserable years in a cubical, I finaly realized that it was time to follow my true passion. So, I quit my job and went back to college to pursue a diploma in software engineering…
